summary: An Ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2849 for the improvement of The Alley in Block 50, John H. Nagle's 2nd Addition, being the alley between North Broadway and Harvard Avenue North, and extending from East John Street to East Thomas Street, all in the City of Seattle by grading and curbing the same and providing for the necessary surface drainage, under Ordinance No. 34502, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
